dmca.title: DMCA Notice Attached
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Elledge [mailto:ryan.elledge@inetinteractive.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 2004 9:32 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notice Attached
Importance: High

 

Mr Lance Crosby, Esq:

 

Attached please find a DMCA notice for the website WEBDESIGN-TALK.COM which
is not only violating our intellectual property rights but also illegally
serving banners from our network, having copied our code.  This violation is
causing us and our advertisers financial harm.  We request your cooperation
with the DMCA attached in pdf form.  The DMCA is also being sent via
facsimile.

 

 

Sincerely,

 

 

Ryan Elledge, President

iNET Interactive, LLC
